argument.name: count
argument.description: The number of characters to move.

page.description: Skip over a number of characters.
page.discussion: The <StringScanner>.SkipOver() function moves the offset Count characters. The argument can be positive (moving towards the end of the buffer) or negative (moving towards the start of the buffer).
page.example: dim scanner as P dim txt as C txt = <<%text% This is wonderful prose written by a technical writer of note. %text% scanner = stringscanner.create(txt) scanner.skipover(5) ? scanner.GetToOffset() = "This " ? scanner.getremainder() = is wonderful prose written by a technical writer of note.
